Notes: Epi (epiphyte), Fern, Grass (graminoid), Herb (herbaceous dicots), HmEpi (hemi-epiphytes), Liana (woody climbers, scramblers etc), Palm, Shrub, Succulent, Tree, Vine (herbaceous climbers, scramblers, etc)
D (deciduous), E (evergreen); categories assigned to woody species only
leaf area (= area of leaflets, for compound-leaved species), in cm2
leaf area (= area of the whole leaf, for compound-leaved species; same data as "leaf size", for simple-leaved species), in cm2
mean temperature during the growing season (oC)
mean temperature of the coldest month (oC)
mean temperature of the coldest month during the growing season (oC)
mean temperature of the warmest month (oC)
mean precipitation during the growing season (mm)
coefficient of variation between monthly precipitation mean values (mm)
moisture index, during the growing season (mm/mm)
Equilibrium evapotranspiration, during the growing season (mm)
daily irradiance, during the growing season (W/m2)
